subject: contructor executed at each test method
msgSnippet: Hello , As the subject says it, i found out that the constructor of a testCase get executed for every test method. Is this the normal behaviour ? Thanks
messageBody:
Hello ,

As the subject says it, i found out that the
constructor of a testCase get executed for every test
method. Is this the normal behaviour ?
Thanks
